missions.title: Mission: First Contact
missions.description: The Galactic Council needs information about the planets in the Proxima system. Objective: Retrieve a list of all planets, ordered by their distance from the sun.
missions.hint:
Use SELECT to retrieve data, and ORDER BY to arrange the results.
Example: SELECT * FROM table_name ORDER BY column_name;
missions.successMessage: Excellent work, SQL Knight! You've successfully retrieved the planetary data for the Galactic Council.

missions.title: Mission: Resource Discovery
missions.description: The Galactic Trading Federation needs to know which resources are most valuable for interstellar commerce. Objective: Find all resources with a market value greater than 5000, ordered by value (highest first).
missions.hint:
Use WHERE to filter results and ORDER BY with DESC to sort in descending order.
Example: SELECT * FROM table_name WHERE column_name > value ORDER BY column_name DESC;
missions.successMessage: Outstanding work! The Galactic Trading Federation can now prioritize the most valuable resources for their commercial routes.

missions.title: Mission: Population Census
missions.description: The Interstellar Health Organization needs to identify which alien species have the largest populations to prioritize medical aid. Objective: Find all species with a population greater than 3 million, ordered by intelligence level.
missions.hint:
Combine WHERE and ORDER BY to filter and sort the results.
Example: SELECT * FROM table_name WHERE column_name > value ORDER BY other_column;
missions.successMessage: Well done! The Interstellar Health Organization can now allocate medical resources effectively based on population and intelligence levels.

missions.title: Mission: Planetary Relations
missions.description: Scientists need to understand the relationship between planets and their native species. Objective: Find all planets and their corresponding species, including planets without any species.
missions.hint:
Use JOIN operations to combine data from multiple tables.
Example: SELECT * FROM table1 LEFT JOIN table2 ON table1.id = table2.foreign_id;
missions.successMessage: Excellent analysis! The scientists now have a complete picture of planetary habitation patterns.

missions.title: Mission: Resource Analysis
missions.description: The Galactic Trading Federation needs a summary of resource value by planet. Objective: Calculate the total market value of resources for each planet and order by total value (highest first).
missions.hint:
Use GROUP BY with aggregate functions to summarize data.
Example: SELECT column1, SUM(column2) FROM table GROUP BY column1;
missions.successMessage: Outstanding work! The Federation now has clear insight into the resource value distribution across planets.
